## CodeMetadata class

The metadata of a Smart Contract, as an abstraction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class CodeMetadata 
```

</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[(constructor)(upgradeable, readable, payable, payableBySc)](sdk-core.codemetadata._constructor_.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Creates a metadata object. By default, set the `upgradeable` attribute, and uset all others.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
